select id, area_no areaNo, area_name areaName, depart_id departId, depart_name departName, manage_user manageUser, manage_user_name manageUserName, manage_phone managePhone, `desc`, item_ids itemIds, images, record_status recordStatus, record_user_no recordUserNo, record_user_name recordUserName, record_user_phone recordUserPhone, record_location recordLocation, record_location_name recordLocationName, app_client_id appClientId, DATE_FORMAT(update_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') updateTime, DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') createTime from scan_records where id = #{id}

select id, user_no userNo, role_no roleNo, depart_id departId, area_no areaNo, DATE_FORMAT(update_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') updateTime, DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') createTime from scan_permission where user_no = #{userNo}

SELECT id, record_id recordId, action_type actionType, CASE action_type WHEN 0 THEN '未通过' WHEN 1 THEN '新增' WHEN 2 THEN '审核' WHEN 3 THEN '处理' WHEN 4 THEN '归档' END AS 'actionTypeName', action_item_ids actionItemIds, action_desc actionDesc, action_images actionImages , action_user_no actionUserNo, action_user_name actionUserName, action_user_phone actionUserPhone, action_location actionLocation, action_location_name actionLocationName, app_client_id appClientId, DATE_FORMAT( action_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) actionTime, DATE_FORMAT( update_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) updateTime, DATE_FORMAT( create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) createTime FROM scan_records_action WHERE record_id = #{id} ORDER BY id;

select id, record_id recordId, action_type actionType, case action_type when 0 then '未通过' when 1 then '新增' when 2 then '审核' when 3 then '处理' when 4 then '归档' end as 'actionTypeName', action_item_ids actionItemIds, action_desc actionDesc, action_images actionImages , action_user_no actionUserNo, action_user_name actionUserName, action_user_phone actionUserPhone, action_location actionLocation, action_location_name actionLocationName, app_client_id appClientId, DATE_FORMAT(action_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') actionTime, DATE_FORMAT(update_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') updateTime, DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') createTime from scan_records_action where record_id = #{id} and action_type = 3;
